scripts.sync-and-seed-development-db: NODE_ENV='development' npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV='development' npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV='development' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.sync-and-seed-test-db: NODE_ENV='test' npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV='test' npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV='test' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
